findings.title: Equitable relief without bond requirement
findings.rationale: Equitable relief (injunctions, specific performance) without a bond requirement can expose you to immediate enforcement without financial safeguards typically required by courts.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...acknowledge that monetary damages may be inadequate for breach of this Agreement. Therefore, the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security....
findings.context:
e (5) years from the date of execution.

4. REMEDIES
The parties acknowledge that monetary damages may be inadequate for breach of this Agreement. Therefore, the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

5. ASSIGNMENT
Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party, except in connection with a change of control

findings.title: Broad injunctive relief language
findings.rationale: Broad injunctive relief provisions can bypass standard dispute resolution safeguards.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...acknowledge that monetary damages may be inadequate for breach of this Agreement. Therefore, the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security....
findings.context:
e (5) years from the date of execution.

4. REMEDIES
The parties acknowledge that monetary damages may be inadequate for breach of this Agreement. Therefore, the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

5. ASSIGNMENT
Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party, except in connection with a change of control

findings.title: Broad definitions may expand obligations
findings.rationale: Overly broad defined terms can expand confidentiality or scope beyond what you expect.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...1. CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION "Confidential Information" means all information disclosed by one party to the other, including but not limited to technical data, business plans, customer lists, and financial information....
findings.exact_snippet: means all information disclosed by one party to the other, including
findings.context:
STANDARD NDA TEMPLATE

BETWEEN Company A AND Company B

1. CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION
"Confidential Information" means all information disclosed by one party to the other, including but not limited to technical data, business plans, customer lists, and financial information.

2. NON-DISCLOSURE
The Receiving Party shall not disclose any Confidential Information to any third par

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
